sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import { getProductQuery } from '../queries' import { useMutation } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import { updateProductQuery } from '../queries' export default function EditProduct({ match }) { const id = (match.params.id) const { data, loading, error } = useQuery(getProductQuery, { variables: { id } }) const [updateProduct] = useMutation(updateProductQuery, { variables: { id } }); const [name, setName] = useState(data.product.name) const [price, setPrice] = useState(data.product.price) const [category, setCategory] = useState(data.product.category) const [shortDesc, setShortDesc] = useState(data.product.shortDesc) const [description, setDescription] = useState(data.product.description) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() updateProduct({ variables: { name, price: parseFloat(price), category, shortDesc, description } }) setName('') setPrice(0) setCategory('Health') setShortDesc('') setDescription('') } return (
{ setName(e.target.value) }} />
{ setPrice(e.target.value) }} />
{ setShortDesc(e.target.value) }} />
) }
